product_name: Terry Tech T-Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Great for sweaty climbs up that major hill or days of light drizzle, the women's plus-size Terry Tech T-Shirt wicks moisture away from your skin and dries quickly, so you can ride in comfort. Polyester/spandex fabric stretches beautifully and offers an antimicrobial finish that helps reduce odor. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Covered rear pocket is large enough to stow a wallet or phone. The women's plus-size Terry Tech T-Shirt features a flattering V-neckline, semifitted cut and fun graphic print.
short_description: Great for sweaty climbs up that major hill or days of light drizzle, the women's plus-size Terry Tech T-Shirt wicks moisture away from your skin and dries quickly, so you can ride in comfort.
